definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

pinyin: ni3 a1 tuo1 pin3 yao4 wu4
yao4 wu4 dai4 xie4 dong4 li4 xue2

sentences.english: Some other drugs have to be taken on an empty stomach.
sentences.chinese: 而其他某些藥物，必須在空腹服用。

sentences.english: What is the importance of the test of related substances for antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 試述抗生素藥物有關物質檢查的意義？

sentences.english: Objective To review the recent developments in the research of oxazolidinone antibacterial drugs.
sentences.chinese: 目的闡述惡唑烷酮類抗菌藥物的最新研究進展。

sentences.english: For me, blogging is a drug.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，寫博是一種藥物。

sentences.english: And "sexsomnia" disorders are easily treated with medication, he added.
sentences.chinese: 申克還指出，性行爲睡眠障礙用藥物治療很方便。

sentences.english: One of the disadvantages of the phenothiazines is their potential for dystonic effects.
sentences.chinese: 吩噻嗪類藥物弊端在於其潛在的張力不能反應。

sentences.english: Like all drugs，Miacalcic should be kept out of reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 與其他藥物一樣，密鈣息應妥善保存，勿讓兒童接觸。

sentences.english: Use of expired drugs can be dangerous for patients' health.
sentences.chinese: 使用過期藥物可能對病人的健康造成危害。

sentences.english: This paper tries to explore the application of fine powder technology to Chinese medicinal herbs and insoluble medicines.
sentences.chinese: 本文就難溶藥物與中草藥微細化技術作出探索性研究。
甲狀腺功能減退是可以通過藥物治療好的。

sentences.english: Common side effects from these drugs include muscle pain and soreness.
sentences.chinese: 這些藥物常見的副作用包括肌肉疼痛和痠痛。

sentences.english: Patients with epilepsy or bipolar disorder can have difficulty swallowing tablets.
sentences.chinese: 癲癇病人或雙相性精神障礙病人對吞嚥藥物有困難。

sentences.english: Objective To know the affection and related factors of neuroleptic to myocardial ischemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解抗精神病藥物的影響及相關因素。

sentences.english: Some surgeries and drugs could lead to the sphincter of Oddi dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 某些外科手術或藥物會引起奧狄氏括約肌機能障礙。

sentences.english: Both drug-eluting stents were associated with a marked reduction in target-lesion revascularization.
sentences.chinese: 兩種藥物塗層組靶血管病變的發生率均顯著下降。

sentences.english: How do you respond to questions about performance-enhancing-drug use?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎樣回答關於運動激素藥物服用的問題的？

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
